mcq.statement: What was the main purpose of the Vienna Convention for the Protection of the Ozone Layer?
mcq.one_liner: The main purpose of the Vienna Convention for the Protection of the Ozone Layer was to reduce the production of **chlorofluorocarbons (CFCs)**, which harm the ozone layer.
